sn34.41-45:4.3: samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34.41-45:4.4: neva samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo …
sn34.41-45:4.5: samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca.
sn34.41-45:6.1: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva pañcacattālīsamā ārammaṇamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā pañca suttāni pūretabbāni.
